about.heading: About us!
about.mission: Our mission is high quality life changing biking experience at the tip of your saddle

team.heading: All brought to you by our wonderul researchers

member1.description: David is a young and passionate fella, who spent 27 years of his entire life, sitting and riding bikes. He's done gravity racing all the way to Tour de France, however after injecting steroids in his buttocks, he can no longer do anything besides sitting on the bike saddle.
member1.name: David Motorbike

member2.description: Young and motivated sportswoman with tons of experience. Evil twin of David Motorbike. She's the one who ressurected Maurice. She is also a wonderful friend and deserves to get immortalised on a silly website project
member2.name: Jadwiga Kucharska

member3.description: After years of being dead, Maurice deicded to dig himself out to show the biking world how it's done - after all, being dead is just an excuse, biking is eternal.
member3.name: Maurice Garin Reborn

1.description: Ensures light-weight while bringing NASA-grade durability

2.description: Helps slow down the air leak when the tube breaks

3.description: Uses WiFi or Bluetooth to adjust the shock absorbers based on your phone's GPS

4.description: Loudspeakers blast Mayan death whistle sounds at upcoming cars to get them to slow down

5.description: Ensures user's safety by being able to cut items, protecting from sticks or small animals

6.description: Specially engineered holes in the saddle to optimize airflow for cooling effects

7.description: When detecting human screams above 100dB, brakes activate, halting the bike completely at 130dB

8.description: Special system converting kinetic energy to electricity to charge your phone
